title: Kidnapped by Deutsche Bahn
author: JeremyTheo
aiHeadline: Deutsche Bahn kidnaps you, but at least you get a free ride and a lifetime of unforgettable memories (and probably some legal paperwork).

title: You can make up HTML tags
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: You can make up HTML tags, but don't expect anyone to understand your genius or your browser to render it properly. Welcome to the wild world of web development!

title: GOG is getting acquired by its original co-founder
author: haunter
aiHeadline: GOG is getting acquired by its original co-founder, proving that sometimes the best way to fix a company is to let it come full circle—like a ouroboros made of nostalgia.

title: Google is dead. Where do we go now?
author: tomjuggler
aiHeadline: Google is dead. Where do we go now? Probably to Bing, but let's be honest, we'll all just keep using DuckDuckGo anyway because privacy is cool.

title: Show HN: Z80-μLM, a 'Conversational AI' That Fits in 40KB
author: quesomaster9000
aiHeadline: Show HN: Z80-μLM, a 'Conversational AI' That Fits in 40KB—because sometimes you want your AI to be as tiny as your brain when it's trying to understand what's going on.
